name: node-http-server
description: Create a valid html file called `index.html`. It should contain an h1 saying: "My First Node.js Web Server" and an image linking to the Node.js logo: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/nodejs/nodejs.org@886b30fde80f35fd0db98793f258d78a9ae0a997/static/images/logo-light.svg
